name: mississippian
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US state of Mississippi: The boat belongs to Mississippian Charles Graham. More Mississippians are seeing the value in getting a college degree.
More examplesFewer examplesThousands of Mississippians served in Lee's Army of Northern Virginia. Every Mississippian remembers what they were doing on August 29, 2005.All Mississippians want better jobs, better schools, better health care and more opportunities.

from or relating to the US state of Mississippi or its people: Robert Johnson was a Mississippian blues guitarist. I went to the Grand Hotel with my Mississippian friend Julia.
More examplesFewer examplesHe spoke in a lazy Mississippian drawl.It is believed the Mississippian Indians settled on the site around 1200.During the heyday of the Mississippian civilization, the city took in 4,000 acres.
